summary: Moles, Nipples, Pubic Hairstyles and Dirt for CBBE and UNP.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/27352-1-1399637528.jpg[/img]

========================================================================================

[color=GreenYellow][size=3][u][b]Installation:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

First of all make sure you have [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]CBBE[/url] or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]UNP[/url] installed.

1) Download with Manager.
2) Activate Mod.

[color=GreenYellow][size=3][u][b]How to blend:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

Now navigate to your "Skyrim/Data/CalienteTools/Body Options Blender" folder
and double click "TexBlend.exe".

1) At "Set:" select "Body and Feet".
[color=orange]2) At "Type:" select "Color".[/color]
3) Select what you want to blend from the middle list.

Make sure you stick to the priority list. But if you don't want Body Muscles for example simply skip to Priority 2.

4) Click on "Preview".
5) Click on "Blend Images".
6) Hit "OK" when completed.

Repeat step 2 to 6 for any other options you want to blend.

[color=orange]You [u]NEED[/u] to reselect "Color" (step 2) as well as click on "Preview" every time you blend a new option, if you don't do this Texture Blender wont reset what has been used last time. And you end up double blending everything.[/color]

(You can double click any of the options to see a preview in the middle window. Double click that window to enlarge it)

========================================================================================

[color=GreenYellow][size=3][u][b]Additional Info:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

The "Moles - - -" option is to be used with one of the Special Moles options.

========================================================================================

[color=GreenYellow][size=6][u][b]Failed to Save File or Black Body/Face:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

[size=3][b]Problem:[/b] [color=orange]Failed to Save File.[/color]
[b]Cause:[/b] Skyrim installed in "Program Files (x86)".
[b]Solution:[/b] Adjust "config.xml" as explained below.

[b]Problem:[/b] [color=orange]Black Body/Face after blending.[/color]
[b]Cause:[/b] No source textures found, unable to detect Skyrim Data folder (could be related to the Skyrim INI files)
[b]Solution:[/b] Adjust "config.xml" as explained below.[/size]

1) Go to the folder where "TexBlend.exe" is located.
2) Open "Config.xml" with [url=http://notepad-plus-plus.org/download/v6.6.3.html]NotePad++[/url].

There are two paths shown in Green (Line 6 and 10):

<!-- <GameDataPath>D:|steam|steamapps|common|skyrim|Data|</GameDataPath>

and

<!-- <TexOutputPath>C:|steam|steamapps|common|skyrim|Data|</TexOutputPath>

3) Change the path in both lines to where your Skyrim Data Folder is located.
4) Remove "<!--" infront of both lines. (it should change color to Blue and Black)
5) Save the file.

Done!

========================================================================================

[color=GreenYellow][size=3][u][b]Recommended Mods:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31782]Dry Skin[/url] by Svarog
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29791]No More Ugly Bronze Shine[/url] by COTS

========================================================================================

[color=GreenYellow][size=3][u][b]Credits and Special Thanks:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

Caliente for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5737]Texture Blender[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]CBBE[/url]
dimon99 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709]DIMONIZED UNP Female Body[/url]
author: Lunyra

files.name: Body Options - CBBE
files.changelogHtml:
- Made all Pubic Hairs Dark Brown instead of Black.
- Removed Pubic Hair from CBBE Real Girls package, they are now part of the Main File.
- New Fuller Muff. (CBBE only for now)
